榜.definition: notice or announcement; list of names; public roll of successful examinees

榜一大哥.definition: highest-ranking donor of a live streamer

榜單.definition: list of successful applicants for college admission; list of people or entities ranked highest according to some metric

榜樣.definition: model; example (for people to follow); (in reference to a person) role model

榜眼.definition: candidate who came second in the Han-lin examination; see 狀元|状元[zhuang4 yuan2]

榜笞.definition: to beat; to flog; to whip

榜葛剌.definition: old Chinese name for Bengal, now written 孟加拉[Meng4 jia1 la1]
